title: Gemini Input Stub for BSI Control Quality Check
description: The minimal information required by the Gemini model to analyze a BSI control's prose and context.

control_context.description: Context of the specific control being evaluated.

prose_to_evaluate.description: A list of prose sections from the control's maturity levels.

part_id.description: The unique ID of the OSCAL 'part' containing the prose, used to map the result back.

prose.description: The actual text to be evaluated.
